Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Nǐ zěn néng zhīdào dà nàn shì shénme
Zài nà rì, zhòngrén jiāng shì fēnsàn de fēi é
shānyuè jiāng shì shūsōng de cǎi 456	dì yī ￮èr zhāng	jìngsài fùshù (tài kǎ sù ěr) róng
Zhìyú shàngōng de fènliàng jiào zhòng zhě
jiàng zài mǎnyì de shēnghuó zhōng
zhìyú shàngōng de fènliàng jiào qīng zhě
tā de guīsù shì shēn kēng
Nǐ zěn néng zhīdào shēn kēng li yǒu shé me
